articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets WFP Representative
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets WFP Representative
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun Tuesday met and had a talk with Claudia Von Roehl, representative of the World Food Programme here who paid a farewell call on him.

articles.title: Greetings from Namibian President
articles.content:
Greetings from Namibian President
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Namibian President Hifikepunye Pohamba on Dec. 18 last year.
					 In the message the president, on behalf of the Namibian government and people and on his own behalf, extended greetings on the prospering new year to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The message expressed firm belief that the two countries would make sustained efforts to boost the existing solid bilateral relations in the new year, too.

articles.title: 17th Kimjongilia Festival to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
17th Kimjongilia Festival to Be Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The 17th Kimjongilia Festival will take place in Pyongyang on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The festival to be opened at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition from mid-February will bring together ministries and national institutions, service personnel, people of various circles, school youth and children and overseas compatriots' organizations including the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and foreigners.
					
					 There will be shows of the immortal flower and Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses will open to visitors in localities.

articles.title: More Meetings Held at Industrial Establishments and Farms
articles.content:
More Meetings Held at Industrial Establishments and Farms
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- More meetings took place at industrial establishments and cooperative farms in various parts of the country to vow to implement the important tasks set forth by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Reports were made to be followed by speeches there.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that the New Year Address serves as important guidelines as it indicates the way to be followed by Songun Korea and a banner instilling redoubled strength into the Korean people advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism. 
					
					 They underscored the need to boost production at each worksite in hearty response to the slogan "Let us bring about a radical turn in the building of an economic giant with the same spirit and mettle as were displayed in conquering space!"
					
					 They said that the officials and other people would cherish deep in their hearts Kim Jong Il's patriotism, the eternal soul and breath of Kim Il Sung's nation and a driving force for the building of a thriving country and display their patriotic enthusiasm and spirit of devoted service in the ongoing sacred struggle to achieve the prosperity of the socialist country.
					
					 They called for working hard to achieve the prosperity of the socialist country, firmly rallied behind the WPK in one mind under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: DPRK's Promising Speed Skaters
articles.content:
DPRK's Promising Speed Skaters
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A number of promising skating athletes were produced in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea through the Osandok Prize Sports Contest in December last year.
					 In particular, young athletes took the titles in the short-track speed skating events of the contest, drawing attention of experts and fans.
					
					 Ri Yong Sil, a coach of the Jangsan Sports Team, told KCNA: 
					
					 "The young title winners fully displayed their physical, technical and tactical preparedness they had attained in trainings with a mind to glorify the honor of the country."
					
					 Om Chol and Kim Jong Mi from the Jangsan Sports Team topped the individual all-round standings in the short-track speed skating events.
					
					 They are good in velocity, strength and perseverance. They began learning skating at the Sosong District Juvenile Sports School.

articles.title: Schoolers Conduct Various Activities during Winter Vocation
articles.content:
Schoolers Conduct Various Activities during Winter Vocation
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- School youth and children in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now spending their winter vocation days with sports and social activities.
					 Sports parks, Ice Rink, People's Open-air Ice Rink and Skate Park in Pyongyang are crowded with schoolchildren playing ice and roller skating.
					
					 They also entertain themselves at the Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and the Central Youth Hall.
					
					 Football and basketball games and Taekwon-Do contests are gaining momentum among students.
					
					 Yut and paduk (go) are favorite folk games of schoolchildren.
					
					 In particular, kite-flying is popular among children. Kites with letters reading "knowledge, good morality and health", "five marks" and "satellite launch" and those portraying the DPRK national flag are seen flying in the air above Kim Il Sung Square, plaza of April 25 House of Culture and other places of Pyongyang City.
					
					 Visits to revolutionary sites and get-together with war veterans are also organized in the vocation days.
					
					 Meanwhile, university students in Pyongyang conduct various forms of agitation activities at industrial establishments and on co-op farms to encourage workers and peasants in effecting innovations in production and farming preparation in hearty response to the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year address.

articles.title: Saenal, Korea's First Revolutionary Newspaper
articles.content:
Saenal, Korea's First Revolutionary Newspaper
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The history of revolutionary media in Korea began with birth of the newspaper Saenal (New Day).
					 After forming the Down-with-Imperialism Union in October Juche 15 (1926), President Kim Il Sung paid big efforts to enlightening the popular masses.
					
					 As part of the work, he proposed publishing a newspaper and worked heart and soul to that effect. His proposal enjoyed full support from members of the Saenal Children's Union and the Paeksan Youth League and they took the gloves off in publishing the newspaper.
					
					 He personally wrote articles to be carried in the first issue of the newspaper.
					
					 His mother, Kang Pan Sok, a preeminent leader of the Korean women's liberation movement, took upon herself the work of securing paper, printing ink and stencil paper and making delivery of newspaper.
					
					 His younger brother, Kim Chol Ju, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, dedicated articles to the newspaper.
					
					 At last, the first issue of the newspaper Saenal was published in Fusong of China on Jan. 15, Juche 17 (1928).
					
					 The newspaper became very popular among readers for its revolutionary and appealing news items and greatly contributed to arousing the broad masses to an anti-Japanese struggle.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on States Concerned to Do Things Helpful to Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on States Concerned to Do Things Helpful to Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The issue of Korea's reunification is a product of foreign forces' domination and interference in its internal affairs, says Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 It continues:
					
					 The states concerned should do things helpful to reunifying Korea in order to open a new phase in the settlement of the issue of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The struggle of the Korean people for national reunification is the one to realize national sovereignty by terminating foreign forces' domination and interference.
					
					 The issue of Korea's reunification can never be settled in a fair manner unless national sovereignty is respected.
					
					 Those states concerned should not hamstring the efforts of the Korean nation for reunification.
					
					 The U.S. is directly held responsible for the issue of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. military occupation of south Korea divided the Korean nation into two and sparked off antagonism and confrontation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. turned south Korea into a nuclear outpost and has staged frequent provocative military drills against the DPRK, sharply increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula and laying a stumbling block in the way of Korea's reunification.
					
					 It is necessary to oppose aggression and war moves and remove the war danger in order to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 To this end, it is necessary for the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Japan is also required to refrain from anything obstructive to Korea's reunification.
					
					 But for the interference and obstruction of Japan, the Korean people's cause of national reunification would have made great progress.
					
					 Japan can never evade this responsibility.
					
					 Had Japan redeemed its past crimes, abandoned its hostile policy toward the DPRK, stopped stoking division in Korea and done nothing obstructive to Korea's reunification, there would have been a change in the abnormal DPRK-Japan relations.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Working Hard to Realize "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere"
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Working Hard to Realize "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere"
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The Japanese minister of Defence and the U.S. military chief were reported to have been closeted recently over the issue of revising the "Japan-U.S. Defence Cooperation Guidelines". Timed to coincide with this, the present ruling forces of Japan are working in the direction of introducing Global Hawk to the "Self-Defense Forces" with an aim to gather information about the DPRK and China. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese warmongers' aim is to lay a legal framework to turn Japan into a military power and realize without fail its ambition for reinvasion backed by the U.S.
					
					 It is an invariable ambition of the Japanese militarists to realize the old dream "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" which they could not do in the past through the legalization of reinvasion against Asia-Pacific countries.
					
					 Japan has systematically stepped up its moves to turn itself into a military giant while talking about "revenge" for its defeat in war. Whenever an opportunity presented itself, Japan removed one by one legal and institutional mechanisms as they are obstacles to realizing its scenario for turning itself into a military giant.
					
					 Under the pretext of coping with emergency in its vicinity, Japan recovered the SDF's rights to take part in a war and wage a war and established a wartime system whereby the prime minister can mobilize armed forces for a war.
					
					 The SDF has pushed ahead with the modernization of air and naval striking forces, bolstering up long-distance transport and operation capabilities.
					
					 In the new year, the Japanese reactionaries decided to sharply increase the defence budget for fiscal year 2013 so as to reinforce the SDF's strength and equipment.
					
					 Japan's aggressive nature has been brought to daylight and the chariot of militarism is running at breakneck speed along the dangerous orbit of reinvasion.
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries opt to launch reinvasion, obsessed with their old dream, this will only precipitate their destruction, the commentary warns.

articles.title: Japan Should Bear in Mind It is Part of World: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Japan Should Bear in Mind It is Part of World: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, the New York Times in an editorial strongly criticized Japan, recalling that Japanese Prime Minister Abe hinted the will of the Japanese government to reexamine its apology for the past crimes including sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army. 
					 The editorial said Abe has long tried to rewrite the history of war and that such shameful action would touch off anger among Japan's neighboring countries. 
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary says the editorial of the New York Times reflects the overall feelings of the international community towards Japan rather than a stand of an individual or a country.
					
					 What the international community urges Japan to do is to sincerely reflect on its past crimes and settle the issue and get reconciled and cooperate with other countries of the world, its neighboring countries, in particular, on this basis and opt for peace, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 However, Japan has taken quite a different road so far. 
					
					 Blatantly challenging the demand of the international community for settling its past crimes, Japan has made desperate efforts to deny or embellish its history of crimes stained with the blood shed by Asian people. It was so insolent as to assert Japan had done nothing wrong in the past.
					
					 It is the political idea of Abe, ultra-right militarist maniac, to remove all the traces of the insufficient "admission" Japan made to its past crimes, make the Japanese forget consciousness of guilty of the past, provide a war constitution at an early date and thus lead Japan to militarist overseas aggression. 
					
					 Abe is sadly mistaken if he thinks the international community will remain an onlooker to self-complacent and arrogant Japan bringing the dark clouds of war through its moves to turn itself into a military giant and its policy for overseas expansion in wanton violation of the moral and ethical norms of the international community. 
					
					 The international community is watching with high vigilance Japan going immoral, getting more problematic in its understanding of history and bringing its conservative colors to bolder relief. 
					
					 Even its master the U.S. warns Japan of its wrong attitude at a government level. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to behave itself as a member of the international community, mindful that Japan is not outside the world but its part.

articles.title: Capitalism Has No Future: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Capitalism Has No Future: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Dignitaries in the West declare the end of capitalism by themselves whereas there grows the tendency to estimate Marxism from a new angle. This proves the truth of history that capitalism is bound to go to ruin and socialism is sure to win. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The contradiction of the capitalist system at present has reached its height, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Accumulation of capital is being promoted in capitalist society and wealth is concentrated on the monopoly plutocrats with the progress in technology whereas an increasing number of the people engaged in mental labor are being hired by capitalists.
					
					 The gap between the rich and the poor is widening as the days go by in capitalist society under the reign of the principle of existence that money is almighty, screwing up class confrontation and contradiction.
					
					 Capitalism is torn with its internal contradiction which makes its doom inescapable.
					
					 In order to keep its ever-more endangered privileged position from its political and economic crisis the capitalist class is opting for fascistizing its reactionary ruling machines and intensifying the moves for aggression and war.
					
					 It is none other than the capitalist class and the Western politicians, its mouthpiece, who make desperate efforts to maintain the capitalist system, rendering their ruling system more fascist and politics more reactionary as they are in the grip of an economic crisis.
					
					 The capitalist class is massively spreading reactionary and unpopular ideology and culture and corrupt bourgeois lifestyle in a bid to benumb the working masses' consciousness of independence, make them obedient to the capitalist exploiting system and reduce them to slavers of money. This makes people more ignorant and benighted.
					
					 The capitalist system is inching closer to its end due to reactionary political life, deformed material life and poor mental and cultural life.
					
					 It is a matter of time for capitalism which outlived its days to disappear from the arena of history.

articles.title: KCNA Brands US as Arch Criminal Escalating Arms Race
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Brands US as Arch Criminal Escalating Arms Race
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The United States keeps selling war hardware to different parts of the world, becoming more talkative about "arms reduction" than any other countries. 
					 Last year the U.S. exported weapons worth 63 billion U.S. dollars through 65 arms deals. 
					
					 The U.S. State Department received a total of more than 85,000 requests for arms export, an all-time high. 
					
					 It is reported that the U.S. arms export to the Asia-Pacific region last year increased 5.4 percent over the previous year. 
					
					 This suggests that the U.S. arms export is on the steady increase despite international community's curse and censure.
					
					 The U.S. arms export is dangerous as it is disturbing world peace and stability and sparking arms race. 
					
					 The U.S. is sparking civil wars and territorial disputes in different parts of the world and selling huge quantities of weapons, citing someone's non-existent "threat". 
					
					 The U.S. labeled the DPRK and China as open and potential rivals in East Asia. It is busy selling weapons to their neighboring countries and other countries, floating stories about security uneasiness. 
					
					 The U.S. sold out a lot of war equipment necessary for sudden invasion of the DPRK including MRAP to south Korea last year. 
					
					 It is mulling selling to south Korea 60 F-35s and four Global Hawks capable of making precision monitoring of not only the strategic depth of the DPRK but its neighboring countries. 
					
					 It is also contemplating selling to Japan war equipment worth 421 million U.S. dollars necessary for rounding off the Aegis system. 
					
					 These moves are rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity extremely tense and escalating the arms race. 
					
					 Not a day passes in the Mideast without bloody armed conflicts as it is flooded with U.S.-made arms.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. is the arch criminal disturbing world peace and stability and escalating arms race. 
					
					 The U.S. has the lion's share of the world's annual arms sale. This is aimed at carrying out its strategy for world hegemony. 
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. to tightly bind other countries militarily through arms delivery while escalating the arms race to deter regional development and create environment favorable for realizing its strategy for world domination. 
					
					 The international community desirous of world peace and stability will never tolerate the dangerous arms sale of the U.S.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Meet
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Meet
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place in Tokyo on January 12 to achieve a great stride forward in the efforts to usher in a new heyday, true to the New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and his message of greeting on the New Year.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Nam Sung U and Ko Tok U, its vice-chairmen, and Pak Ku Ho, its vice-chairman who doubles as chairman of the Committee for Rights and Welfare, Pae Jin Gu, its vice-chairman and general director of its Secretariat, Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, its department directors, vice-chairpersons of its committee, advisors to Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the permanent advisor and the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, leading officials of central organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, chairpersons of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and officials of its organizations at various levels and teachers.
					
					 The participants first listened to Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 Read out then was a message of greeting sent by Kim Jong Un to the chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee on the New Year.
					
					 Ho in his report said that having received the historic New Year Address and the first message of greeting in the new year with immense excitement, the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are now all out in the patriotic movement.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's message to the meeting of branch officials of Chongryon indicates important guidelines for dynamically advancing the movement of Koreans in Japan only along the road of Juche, patriotism and prosperity, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that the officials of Chongryon would join the people in the homeland in remaining true to Kim Jong Un's leadership, deeply enshrining his noble intention to eternally glorify the idea of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the overseas compatriots movement and their exploits performed in the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Letter from Participants in Meeting of Officials of Chongryon
articles.content:
Letter from Participants in Meeting of Officials of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un on Jan. 12 received a letter from the participants in the meeting of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held to vow to make a great stride forward in the efforts to usher in a new heyday in hearty response to his New Year Address and new year message.
					 The letter said that upon receiving his New Year Address and first message in the new year, the officials of Chongryon deeply grasped his noble intention to glorify the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of the overseas compatriot movement and their feats for all ages.
					
					 The letter manifested their firm determination to usher in a new heyday of the Korean movement in Japan without fail, remaining loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is taking warm care of Koreans in Japan, saying that he would always be with Chongryon formed by President Kim Il Sung and led by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also reiterated their will to steadily strengthen Chongryon which was formed and emerged victorious under the care of the great men of Mt. Paektu into a model organization of the world overseas compatriot movement, the organization which upholds their leaders and country with pure consciousness and loyalty.
					
					 The letter evinced their resolution to thoroughly embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism and thus firmly defend the socialist country advancing toward a final victory and briskly conduct foreign activities to achieve the country's reunification and protect the compatriots' rights.

articles.title: Seminar on New Year Address Held by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Seminar on New Year Address Held by Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the New Year Address made by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un took place in Tokyo on Jan. 10. It was sponsored by the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan.
					 A report was made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan were greatly excited and pleased to receive his historic New Year Address.
					
					 The behests of leader Kim Jong Il were successfully carried out last year which marked the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, they noted.
					
					 This year is a year of great creations and changes in which a radical turnabout will be effected in the building of a thriving socialist country on the road of the onward march in the new century of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, they said, adding:
					
					 The New Year Address reflects the iron will and grand plan of Kim Jong Un to bring about a decisive turn in building an economic giant and improving the standard of people's living this year.
					
					 Calling on all the Koreans to get united this year and bring about a new phase of national reunification through a nationwide patriotic movement for reunification, they urged the south Korean authorities to opt for taking the road of national reconciliation and reunification, clearly mindful that confrontation with fellow countrymen will only lead to a war.
					
					 They underscored the need to firmly preserve and carry forward the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for the cause of national reunification and thus open a new phase of implementing the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia on December 31 last year.
					 The work published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation. 
					
					 It also deals with the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army firmly guarantees the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party" was brought out in booklet by the N. K. Publishing House of Nigeria, the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House of Austria and the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo.
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that it is a principled requirement for victoriously advancing the cause of Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea forever. It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Theatrical Art Praised by Brazilian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Theatrical Art Praised by Brazilian Organization 
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on Jan. 8 placed on its website an article titled "Peculiar and fresh-style theatrical art of DPRK with emergence of Moranbong Band".
					 The article referred to the great achievements made in the DPRK's theatrical art last year, adding:
					
					 It is necessary to mention, among other things, the peculiar and fresh-style performance of the Moranbong Band that presented a true picture of the Juche-oriented music. 
					
					 The band gave a demonstration performance in July last year.
					
					 Just 10 odd musicians played resonant, exquisite and dynamic melodies with refined rendition and young promising singers presented emotional and cheerful songs truthfully representative of their requirements, mesmerizing the audience.
					
					 The prestigious Unhasu Orchestra also decorated last year with peculiar performances.
					
					 Concert "Women Are Flowers" given by the Unhasu Orchestra to celebrate the March 8 International Women's Day, concert "Family of General" given by it to mark the May Day and other concerts of peculiar styles representing the true picture of society in the DPRK where all people lead a worthwhile life in harmony deeply impressed the audience. 
					
					 Performances given by other art troupes including the Mansudae Art Troupe and the Phibada Opera Troupe on important occasions also greatly encouraged the people in their dynamic drive to create a new spirit of the era and make innovations.
					
					 Last year witnessed the 500th performance of the light comedy "Echo among Mountains", Kim Il Sung Prize laureate, and the 1,500th performance of the revolutionary opera "A Flower Girl." 
					
					 The successes made by the light comedy in a matter of little over two years clearly proved what great influence and attraction a piece of art work has.

articles.title: DPRK's Fine Art Introduced by ITAR-TASS
articles.content:
DPRK's Fine Art Introduced by ITAR-TASS
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- ITAR-TASS of Russia on Jan. 10 introduced the developing fine art in the DPRK that opened a new phase in pictorial art.
					 Korean style jewel-powdered paintings, a unique style of formative art, are highly appreciated in the world because they keep their original colors unchanged for hundreds of years, the news agency said.
					
					 Referring to means and objectives of jewel-powdered paintings' depiction, the news agency continued: Such paintings vividly deal with the picture of the DPRK, a land of morning calm. They present a good harmony of nature, environment and traditional manners and customs.
					
					 The Korean Jewel-powdered Painting Studio was organized at an instruction of leader Kim Jong Il, said ITAR-TASS, adding he paid deep attention to the creation of jewel-powdered paintings.
					
					 It also recalled that those paintings were highly appreciated at international exhibitions.
					
					 Jewel-powdered paintings have become popular in foreign countries as a peculiar industrial art of the DPRK.

articles.title: New Year Address Introduced in Bulgaria
articles.content:
New Year Address Introduced in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A detailed gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was introduced by the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in its bulletin No. 1 on January 8.
					 The bulletin carried his photo.

articles.title: New Year Address Introduced in Various Countries
articles.content:
New Year Address Introduced in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The full text or gist of the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was posted on websites of organizations of different countries from Jan. 1 to 7.
					 They included the Moscow Workers' Union of Russia, Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Study Group in Fermo of Italy, Anti-imperialist Forum of Germany, Kim Jong Il Library of Ecuador and the Libyan website Libyan.
					
					 Photos of Kim Jong Un were also posted on websites of the German organization and Libya.

articles.title: New Year Address Serves as Milestone for Reunification of Korea: Austrian Organizations
articles.content:
New Year Address Serves as Milestone for Reunification of Korea: Austrian Organizations
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Austrian organizations issued statements on January 8 supporting the New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The Federal Leadership of the Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation fully supported the tasks set forth in the New Year Address, its part dealing with the issue of Korea's reunification in particular.
					
					 The policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen pursued by the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime in south Korea created a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula and it has been exploited by the U.S. imperialists as a tool for carrying out their strategy for dominating the world, the organization said.
					
					 The south Korean regime should roll back its confrontation policy and opt for realizing the old wish of the Korean nation for its reunification, it noted.
					
					 It said that it is convinced that the New Year Address serves as a landmark for Korea's reunification.
					
					  The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna fully supported the part of the New Year Address dealing with the issue of Korea's reunification and urged the south Korean regime to abandon its confrontation policy and take the road of peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: New Year Address Favored Abroad
articles.content:
New Year Address Favored Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un was supported by political figures in different countries.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said in a statement on Jan. 1: 
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address said the road of Juche is the only path for our Party and people to invariably follow and great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the ever-victorious banner of our revolution. We should march forward along the road of independence, the road of Songun and the road of socialism to the end upholding the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he added. His teachings instill confidence in sure victory and optimism not only into the Korean people but into the world progressives.
					
					 Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party who is minister of Information, said on January 7 in his talk with the DPRK ambassador to his country that he fully supported Kim Jong Un's address calling upon the whole Korean nation to wage a dynamic struggle for thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Harinde Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, told on January 8 an official of the DPRK embassy in Jakarta that he listened to the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un over TV several times, expressing full support to the orientation and tasks for Korea's reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, in a statement on January 6 clarified his resolution to continue dynamic activities of solidarity with the Korean people's cause of national reunification, expressing unequivocal support to the New Year Address dealing with the issue of Korea's reunification.

articles.title: Canciller coreano se reune con representante de PMA
articles.content:
Canciller coreano se reune con representante de PMA
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun se reunio el dia 15 con Claudia Von Roehl, representante del Programa Mundial de Alimento, quien le hizo una visita de despedida.

articles.title: Tendra lugar XVII festival de Kimjongilias
articles.content:
Tendra lugar XVII festival de Kimjongilias
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tendra lugar en esta capital el XVII festival de Kimjongilias.
					En el certamen a inaugurarse a mediados de mes que viene en la Exposicion Permanente de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias participaran los ministerios, organos centrales, los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los trabajadores de diferentes sectores, los jovenes y ninos escolares, la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon y otras entidades de los coreanos en ultramar, asi como los amigos extranjeros
					
					En las localidades se realizaran tambien las exposiciones de la misma flor y la visita a los invernaderos de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun demanda a los paises interesados favorecer la reunificacion de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun demanda a los paises interesados favorecer la reunificacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que el problema de reunificacion de Corea fue surgido debido a la dominacion e intervencion de las fuerzas extranjeras, y continua:
					Para abrir la nueva fase para la solucion de ese asunto, los paises interesados deben hacer cosas que contribuyan a la reunificacion de Corea.
					
					La lucha del pueblo coreano por el particular tiene la meta de poner punto final al dominio y la intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas y lograr la independencia de la nacion.
					
					Si no se respeta la soberania nacional, no puede ser solucionado justamente el problema de reunificacion.
					
					Los paises interesados, especialmente Estados Unidos y Japon, no deben obstaculizar los esfuerzos de la nacion coreana por la reunificacion.
					
					EE.UU. es el pais que tiene responsabilidad directa del problema coreano.
					
					Con la ocupacion militar del suelo surcoreano por parte de EE.UU., la nacion coreana quedo dividida en dos partes y se generaron el antagonismo y la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Crecio bruscamente el peligro de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y se ha obstaculizado seriamente la reunificacion de la patria porque el imperio convirtio el territorio surcoreano en la base avanzada nuclear y libro frecuentemente los ejercicios militares provocativos.
					
					Hay que rechazar las maniobras de agresion y guerra y eliminar el peligro de guerra para garantizar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana y lograr la reunificacion del pais.
					
					Para ello, EE.UU. debe suspender su politica hostil anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Japon es otro pais que ha frenado la causa de reunificacion del pueblo coreano.
					
					Si el pais isleno liquida su expediente criminal del pasado, cancela su politica hostil anti-RPDC y no obstaculiza la reunificacion de Corea, se produciran cambios en las anormales relaciones RPDC-Japon.

articles.title: ACNC califica a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz y autor de carrera armamentista
articles.content:
ACNC califica a EE.UU. de perturbador de paz y autor de carrera armamentista
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) ? Estados Unidos habla mas ruidosamente que nadie del "desarme", mientras sigue vendiendo a varios paises del mundo los equipos belicos mortiferos. 
					El ano pasado, el imperio exporto las armas convenientes a mas de 63 mil millones de US$ por medio de los 65 traficos. 
					
					 En tanto, el Departamento de Estado estadounidense batio el record al recibir mas de 85 mil solicitudes de exportacion de armas.
					
					  La exportacion de armas de EE.UU. a la region de Asia-Pacifico se aumento 5.4 por ciento mas que en el ano pasado. 
					
					  Esto insinua que sigue aumentandose la cantidad de exportacion de armas de EE.UU., pese a la denuncia de la sociedad internacional, lo que es un acto muy aventurero que perturba la paz y la estabilidad del mundo y acarrea la carrera armamentista. 
					
					En la actualidad, EE.UU. provoca por doquier del mundo las guerras civiles y los conflictos territoriales y venden en gran medida sus armas pretextando la "amenaza" de alguien. 
					
					En la region de Asia oriental, el imperio fijo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y China como rival publico y oculto y se enfrasca en la exportacion de armas a los paises y regiones del contorno.  
					
					EE.UU. vendio en el ano pasado a los titeres surcoreanos los carros especiales anti-minas y otros pertrechos belicos necesarios a asestar el golpe sorpresivo contra la RPDC. 
					
					En particular, intenta entregarles 60 aviones "F-35" y 4 aviones sin piloto "Global Hawk" capaces de realizar la vigilancia a precision sobre la retaguardia estrategica de la RPDC y hasta los paises vecinos. 
					
					Ademas, pretende vender a Japon los equipos belicos valorados en 421 millones de US$ necesarios a perfeccionar el sistema "Aegis".
					
					Tales maniobras llevan al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y agravan la carrera armamentista. 
					
					En el Medio Oriente se introducen en gran cantidad las armas de fabricacion norteamericana, debido a lo cual no cesan los conflictos armados sangrientos. 
					
					Los hechos evidencian que EE.UU. es el perturbador de la paz y estabilidad del mundo y autor de la carrera armamentista.
					
					EE.UU. recurre obstinadamente a la exportacion de armas con el fin de realizar su estrategia  de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Se desespera por subyugar en lo militar a otros paises y al mismo tiempo, crear la carrera armamentista y obstaculizar el desarrollo regional con el fin de preparar el ambiente favorable a la realizacion de su estrategia de supremacia mundial. 
					
					La sociedad internacional aspirante a la paz y la estabilidad del mundo no perdonara nunca la exportacion de armas de EE.UU.
